messages.content: The old parties are lying about UKIP and its policies. They are scared of UKIP. They don't want you to know the truth. Well, here it is...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: UKIP will keep the NHS free at the point of delivery. UKIP will introduce an Australian-style, points-based immigration system to control immigration and make it fairer.
No tax on the minimum wage. Increase the personal allowance to the minimum wage level, taking those on the minimum out of tax entirely. No inheritance tax.
UKIP opposes wind farms and will scrap the Climate Change Act 2008, saving £18 billion a year.
UK pledges an extra £3 billion per year for the NHS, funded from savings we'll make from leaving the EU.
UKIP will bring empty homes back into use and convert commercial properties into residential ones to help ease the crisis.

issues.brexitEurope: We will be freed from EU membership fees, able to reduce VAT on fuel and give British jobs to British workers.
issues.economy: No tax on the minimum wage. Increase the personal allowance to the minimum wage level, taking those on the minimum out of tax entirely. No inheritance tax.
issues.environment: UKIP opposes wind farms and will scrap the Climate Change Act 2008, saving £18 billion a year.
issues.health: UK pledges an extra £3 billion per year for the NHS, funded from savings we'll make from leaving the EU.
issues.immigration: UKIP will introduce an Australian-style, points-based immigration system to control immigration and make it fairer.

housing.content: UKIP will bring empty homes back into use and convert commercial properties into residential ones to help ease the crisis.
